entry.title: BIP for Legacy Sign Verify functions
entry.summary: The proposal for the expansion of capabilities into new address schemes has been put forward by brianddk. The functionality of signing or verifying messages against SegWit P2SH addresses has been established, but it has not yet been published in a BIP. The proposal aims to provide a reference point for future expansion of these capabilities. The original reference thread regarding this proposal can be found at the provided link.
